howItWorks.title: 3 phases to activate your intelligent enterprise
howItWorks.subtitle: A structured process from diagnosis to operational autonomy — no magic jumps or empty promises.

1.title: Digital Diagnosis
1.description: When you register your company, the system automatically analyzes your website, social media, SEO, competition, and digital positioning to create an operational X-ray.

2.title: Strategic DNA
2.description: Using diagnosis data, specialized agents generate your business strategy: mission, vision, brand, audiences, and content plan — all aligned with your current reality.

3.title: Enterprise Autopilot
3.description: The Enterprise Brain activates its autonomous cycle: observes indicators, analyzes options, validates with guardrails, executes actions, and learns from results — with configurable human oversight.

whatWeDoNot.title: What Buildera does NOT do
whatWeDoNot.subtitle: We believe trust is built with clarity. Here's what you won't find on our platform.

replace.title: Does not replace your business judgment
replace.description: The system suggests and executes operational tasks. High-impact strategic decisions always require your approval.

magic.title: Does not generate magic results
magic.description: Autonomy is progressive. The system needs your business data to learn and improve. The first cycles are calibration.

data.title: Does not invent data or metrics
data.description: Every insight is based on real data from your company. If there's not enough data, the system tells you and suggests how to get it.

unsupervised.title: Does not operate unsupervised
unsupervised.description: Every autonomous action has an auditable log. You can configure which actions require manual approval and set daily limits.

agentsInAction.title: How the Enterprise Brain operates
agentsInAction.subtitle: Concrete examples of how the system processes a need, analyzes it, and generates an action — with full traceability.

strategist.input: The system detects that Instagram engagement dropped 40% in the last 2 weeks.

output.title: Analysis and proposed action
output.content: Diagnosis: algorithm change affected static image posts. Action: migrate 60% of calendar to Reels with brand templates. Guardrail: don't exceed weekly content budget. Status: pending approval.

content.input: A competitor launched a similar product with aggressive pricing.

output.title: New capability proposed
output.content: Gap detected: no competitive pricing monitoring. Proposal: 'Competitive Pricing Monitor' — weekly tracking of competitor prices with alerts. Trial period: 7 days before permanent activation.

insights.input: What patterns has the system identified in the last 4 weeks?

output.title: 3 patterns identified with data
output.content: 1. Posts with real people: +3.2x engagement (based on 45 posts analyzed). 2. Best schedule: Tue/Thu 7-8PM (based on 120 publications). 3. Leads responding in <1h close 58% more (based on 32 opportunities).
